DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1 , single-center , open-label , single arm , baseline-controlled ( safety ) study normal volunteer . Study determine biodistribution excretion radioactive drug substance evaluate safety tolerability 99mTC-Etarfolatide normal volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Biodistribution Safety 99mTC-Etarfolatide ( EC20 ) Normal Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subject must 18 year age old . Subject must major health problem deem principal investigator . Subject must provide informed consent prior enrollment . Subject pregnant breastfeeding . Subject simultaneously participate another investigative drug device study . Subject must complete followup phase previous study least 30 day prior enrollment study . Subject known history chronic abuse drug alcohol test positive prestudy urine drug abuse screen . Subject currently take folic acid supplement stop take supplement period 8 day ( 7 day prior study one day last imaging procedure ) . Subject 's physical condition unsuitable radionuclide imaging . Subject administer another radiopharmaceutical would interfere assessment biodistribution 99mTcetarfolatide .
